Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Just trying to get some fresh air Command.

Lines.Speaker: COMMAND
Lines.Speech: So you breath poison now? Glados is the only thing keeping you from kicking the bucket. Are you a deserter Scully?

Lines.Speaker: COMMAND
Lines.Speech:
That's what I like to hear. Good. __I'm sending it the mission report.

_Read up, Scully.
